title: SILVER ORIANNA QUADRA

embed.description: I get a quadra kill during one of my silver flex q games !! Watch for that shockwave on their adc, Caitlyn and mid, Brand.

body:
Hi everyone,

Would you mind checking out my Orianna quadra kill play?

On a side note, I need help fixing the audio.

When I recorded this clip from the ingame replay function and view it even in my own client under the tab 'highlights' I get that painful 'buzzing' sound instead of the actual in-game sound.

Please tell me how to fix this :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

After asking around it seems that you should be able to expect a fix that _should_ resolve this issue in 7.13

Until that fix drops however, I have a few suggestions that may prevent this from happening;

1. Do NOT fast forward or otherwise speed up/slow down the replay speed before or during recording
2. Disable any outside programs like Razer Synapse and such before making the clip

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=XB78UNwO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-18T01:35:55.528+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> After asking around it seems that you should be able to expect a fix that _should_ resolve this issue in 7.13
> 
> Until that fix drops however, I have a few suggestions that may prevent this from happening;
> 
> 1. Do NOT fast forward or otherwise speed up/slow down the replay speed before or during recording
> 2. Disable any outside programs like Razer Synapse and such before making the clip

I think the first suggestion you gave was the issue !! 

Thanks for helping me out :)

I haven't gone and recorded anything as of yet but will keep that in mind next time I do :D
